narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Consumer Services, Inc. is a Counselor, Mental Health provider based in Mason, MI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $50.0M in Medicaid payments across 360K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $50.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
